AT.name: Shinobi™
AT.description: Von einem Freund betrogen, nimmst du es in dieser Neuauflage der beliebten Shinobi-Reihe mit einem alten, bösartigen Clan auf. Shinobi fängt die klassische Sidescrolling-Action der legendären Shinobi-Reihe perfekt ein. Intensive Kämpfe voller Action an außergewöhnlichen Orten und einmalige Bosskämpfe, das sind die Markenzeichen dieser unvergesslichen Reihe. Shinobi wurde exklusiv für Nintendo 3DS entwickelt und bietet neben atemberaubender 3D-Grafik auch zahlreiche neue Features und Herausforderungen, die nicht nur Shinobi-Veteranen begeistern werden. FEATURES: EIN KLASSIKER KEHRT ZURÜCK Erlebe das klassische Gameplay des Original-Shinobi neu und mit modernem Touch: Pattern-basierte Gegner, wechselndes Gameplay und Sidescrolling-Action vereint mit einzigartiger 3D-Grafik, vielseitigen Kämpfen und brandneuen Herausforderungen. SCHNELLER UND HARTER NINJAKAMPF Besiege Gegner mit Können und Stil, während du zwischen Fernkampf, Nahkampf und akrobatischen Angriffen wechselst. Nutze deine Ninja-Magie, um dich aus brenzligen Situationen zu befreien und dir im Kampf einen entscheidenden Vorteil zu verschaffen. StreetPass-KOMPATIBEL WERDE EIN MEISTERNINJA Mit einem brandneuen Kombosystem, zahlreichen neuen Erfolgen zum Freischalten und Herausforderungskarten wirst du immer wieder versucht sein, deine Punkte und deinen Rang zu verbessern. Sieh dir aufgezeichnete Wiederholungen an, um deine Schwächen herauszufinden und deine Ninja-Fähigkeiten zu perfektionieren.

AU.name: Shinobi™
AU.description: Betrayed by your friend you must battle an ancient and evil clan in this epic reboot of the acclaimed Shinobi series... Shinobi captures the classic side-scrolling action from the original Shinobi games. This coupled with intense combat in exotic locations and over the top boss encounters is what players have loved since the early days of the series. Exclusively developed for the Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi is presented in stunning 3D visuals while introducing several exciting new features and challenges that Shinobi veterans and newcomers will equally enjoy. Game features: A classic reborn Re-experience the classic gameplay of the original Shinobi titles, with a modern twist. Pattern-based enemies, twitch gameplay and side-scrolling action all come together with an updated and unique visual 3D style, deeper combat, and all-new challenges. Fast and furious ninja combat Defeat enemies with skill and style as you switch between ranged, melee and acrobatic attacks on the fly. And rely on your Ninja magic to get you out of tight spots and give you an advantage during intense fights. StreetPass compatible Become a master ninja With a brand new combo system to master, a host of achievements to unlock and challenge maps to complete, you will want to return again and again to better your score and ranking. Watch recorded replays to help find your weaknesses and perfect your Ninja skills.

BE.name: Shinobi™
BE.description: Trahi par votre ami, vous devez combattre un ancien clan ennemi diabolique dans ce renouveau de la célèbre série Shinobi spécialement réalisé pour la Nintendo 3DS. Shinobi reprend le principe d'action en défilement latéral des jeux Shinobi originaux. Ce mode d'action, associé à des combats intenses, des décors renversants et des boss uniques, a fait de la série un succès. Développé exclusivement pour la Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi offre des effets graphiques époustouflants et propose de nouvelles caractéristiques étonnantes ainsi que des défis que les joueurs de la première heure de la série et les novices ne pourront qu'apprécier ! CARACTÉRISTIQUES DU JEU : RENAISSANCE D'UN JEU DE LÉGENDE Redécouvrez le gameplay original des titres de la série Shinobi.Un gameplay vibrant associé à des effets 3D impressionnants vous plongeront dans des combats encore plus intenses tout en vous offrant de nouveaux défis. DES COMBATS NINJA EXPLOSIFS Utilisez les attaques à distance, les attaques de mêlée et les attaques acrobatiques aériennes pour vaincre vos ennemis avec efficacité et style. Comptez sur votre magie de ninja pour vous sortir des situations délicates et prendre l'avantage lors de combats redoutables. COMPATIBLE AVEC StreetPass DEVENEZ UN MAÎTRE NINJA Avec un tout nouveau système de combos à maîtriser, une multitude de succès à débloquer et de cartes à compléter, nul doute que vous allez vouloir jouer encore et encore pour améliorer votre score et votre classement. Visionnez vos combats pour identifier vos faiblesses et perfectionner vos compétences de ninja.

CZ.description: Betrayed by your friend you must battle an ancient and evil clan in this epic reboot of the acclaimed Shinobi series... Shinobi captures the classic side-scrolling action from the original Shinobi games. This coupled with intense combat in exotic locations and over the top boss encounters is what players have loved since the early days of the series. Exclusively developed for the Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi is presented in stunning 3D visuals while introducing several exciting new features and challenges that Shinobi veterans and newcomers will equally enjoy. Game features: A classic reborn Re-experience the classic gameplay of the original Shinobi titles, with a modern twist. Pattern-based enemies, twitch gameplay and side-scrolling action all come together with an updated and unique visual 3D style, deeper combat, and all-new challenges. Fast and furious ninja combat Defeat enemies with skill and style as you switch between ranged, melee and acrobatic attacks on the fly. And rely on your Ninja magic to get you out of tight spots and give you an advantage during intense fights. StreetPass compatible Become a master ninja With a brand new combo system to master, a host of achievements to unlock and challenge maps to complete, you will want to return again and again to better your score and ranking. Watch recorded replays to help find your weaknesses and perfect your Ninja skills.

ES.name: Shinobi™
ES.description: Traicionado por tu amigo, deberás luchar contra un malvado y ancestral clan en esta épica revisión de la aclamada saga Shinobi. Shinobi incorpora la clásica acción con desplazamiento lateral de los juegos originales de la saga. Esto, unido a los intensos combates en exóticas ubicaciones y los destacables enfrentamientos con los jefes finales, es lo que ha atraído a los jugadores desde los inicios de la saga. Desarrollado en exclusiva para Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi se presenta con sorprendentes gráficos 3D e introduce emocionantes y novedosas características y desafíos que apreciarán tanto los veteranos de Shinobi como los que se acercan a esta saga por primera vez. CARACTERÍSTICAS DEL JUEGO: EL RENACIMIENTO DE UN CLÁSICO Vuelve a vivir el sistema de juego de los títulos Shinobi originales, con un toque más moderno. Los enemigos basados en patrones, el intenso sistema de juego y la acción con desplazamiento lateral se aúnan con un estilo visual en 3D actualizado y exclusivo, combates más profundos y desafíos totalmente nuevos. COMBATES NINJA TREPIDANTES Derrota a los enemigos con habilidad y estilo combinando ataques improvisados a distancia, cuerpo a cuerpo y acrobáticos. Confía en tu magia ninja para salir de situaciones difíciles y obtener ventaja durante combates intensos. COMPATIBLE CON StreetPass CONVIÉRTETE EN UN MAESTRO NINJA Gracias a un renovado sistema de combinaciones que deberás dominar, una amplia variedad de logros para desbloquear y mapas de desafíos para completar, no podrás dejar de jugar para mejorar tu puntuación y clasificación. Visualiza repeticiones grabadas para detectar tus puntos débiles y perfeccionar tus habilidades ninja.

IT.name: Shinobi™
IT.description: Tradito dal tuo amico devi affrontare un antico e malefico clan votato al male in questa epica riedizione dell'acclamata serie Shinobi. Shinobi racchiude tutta la classica azione a scorrimento degli originali giochi della serie. Grazie a intensi scontri in luoghi esotici e boss oltre ogni limite, Shinobi offre tutto quello che i giocatori hanno amato fin dall'inizio della serie. Sviluppato esclusivamente per Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi si presenta in una stupefacente versione 3D e introduce diverse nuove caratteristiche e sfide che verranno apprezzate sia dai veterani di Shinobi sia dalle nuove leve. CARATTERISTICHE DI GIOCO: UN CLASSICO RINATO Rivivi la classica dinamica di gioco dei titoli della serie Shinobi originali, con un tocco di modernità. Nemici con comportamenti basati su schemi, prove di riflessi e azione a scorrimento vengono miscelati con uno stile 3D unico e moderno, combattimenti più precisi e sfide completamente nuove. COMBATTIMENTO NINJA VELOCE E POTENTE Sconfiggi i nemici con stile e abilità, alternando in modo immediato acrobazie, scontri corpo a corpo e a distanza. E non dimenticare la magia ninja per uscire da situazioni difficili e ottenere un vantaggio durante gli scontri più intensi. COMPATIBILE CON StreetPass DIVENTA UN MAESTRO NINJA Con un nuovo sistema di combo da imparare, una serie di obiettivi e mappe sfida da completare, vorrai giocare e rigiocare per migliorare punteggio e posizione in classifica. Guarda i replay registrati per individuare i tuoi punti deboli e perfezionare le tue abilità ninja.

Game features: A classic reborn Re-experience the classic gameplay of the original Shinobi titles, with a modern twist. Pattern-based enemies, twitch gameplay and side-scrolling action all come together with an updated and unique visual 3D style, deeper combat, and all-new challenges. Fast and furious ninja combat Defeat enemies with skill and style as you switch between ranged, melee and acrobatic attacks on the fly. And rely on your Ninja magic to get you out of tight spots and give you an advantage during intense fights. StreetPass compatible Become a master ninja With a brand new combo system to master, a host of achievements to unlock and challenge maps to complete, you will want to return again and again to better your score and ranking. Watch recorded replays to help find your weaknesses and perfect your Ninja skills.

ZA.name: Shinobi™
ZA.description: Betrayed by your friend you must battle an ancient and evil clan in this epic reboot of the acclaimed Shinobi series... Shinobi captures the classic side-scrolling action from the original Shinobi games. This coupled with intense combat in exotic locations and over the top boss encounters is what players have loved since the early days of the series. Exclusively developed for the Nintendo 3DS, Shinobi is presented in stunning 3D visuals while introducing several exciting new features and challenges that Shinobi veterans and newcomers will equally enjoy. Game features: A classic reborn Re-experience the classic gameplay of the original Shinobi titles, with a modern twist. Pattern-based enemies, twitch gameplay and side-scrolling action all come together with an updated and unique visual 3D style, deeper combat, and all-new challenges. Fast and furious ninja combat Defeat enemies with skill and style as you switch between ranged, melee and acrobatic attacks on the fly. And rely on your Ninja magic to get you out of tight spots and give you an advantage during intense fights. StreetPass compatible Become a master ninja With a brand new combo system to master, a host of achievements to unlock and challenge maps to complete, you will want to return again and again to better your score and ranking. Watch recorded replays to help find your weaknesses and perfect your Ninja skills.
